analysis package¶

Submodules¶

analysis.Analyser module¶

The Analyser module provides a preparation for analysis and runs plots that can help with understanding the data.

analysis.Analyser.create_analysis_folder()¶

Create the folder for the analysis to be placed.

Returns:analysis folder location
Return type:List[str]
analysis.Analyser.run_analysis(dataset, stage_list)¶

Run analysis against given data and phase list.

Parameters:
  • dataset (object) – CSV-formatted file (as generated by the Analysis module)
  • stage_list (list[str]) – list of stage names (e.g. [‘A’, ‘B’])

analysis.Extractor module¶

The Extractor module takes phase, result (red, red/amber, amber, green), record date/time to prepare for data analysis.

analysis.Extractor.create_analysis_dataset(data, phase_list, analysis_folder)¶

Prepares data for data analysis by creating the analysis dataset.

Parameters:
  • data (object) – CSV-formatted file (as generated by the Analysis module)
  • phase_list (list[str]) – list of stage names (e.g. [‘A’, ‘B’])
  • analysis_folder (string) – analysis folder location
Returns:

data formatted for analysis
Return type:

object

analysis.Main module¶

The Main module runs the data analysis for the latest processed data.

analysis.Plotter module¶

The Plotter module plots a limited amount of examples (to avoid graph cluttering), helpign understanding the nature and the components available in the data.

analysis.Plotter.plot_correlation(df, analysis_folder)¶

Plot correlation of stages as a heat map.

Parameters:
  • df (object) – dataframe
  • analysis_folder (string) – analysis folder location
analysis.Plotter.plot_phase_vs_dt(df, seconds, analysis_folder)¶

Plot phase versus date/time, taking data frame and number of seconds to plot.

Parameters:
  • df (object) – dataframe
  • seconds (int) – number of seconds to plot
  • analysis_folder (string) – analysis folder location
analysis.Plotter.plot_phases_info(df, seconds, analysis_folder)¶

Plot sub-plots of each phase within a data frame for the given number of seconds.

Parameters:
  • df (object) – dataframe
  • seconds (int) – number of seconds to plot
  • analysis_folder (string) – analysis folder location
